text: Vitória da Conquista is a city at the south-central of Bahia, state of Brazil northeast. The city is at 3.040 feet above sea level"Vitória da Conquista." Encyclopædia Britannica. 2010. Encyclopædia Britannica Online. 06 Nov. 2010 . and is in the semi-arid region, with low rainfall and periodic droughts.SANTOS, M.A.F. et al. . Seed bank from soil of coffee plantations associated with grevillea trees. Planta daninha, Viçosa, v. 26, n. 4, 2008 . Available from . access on 06 Nov. 2010. ==References== Category:Cities in Bahia
title: Vitória da Conquista
